mapper.select: select story_no , nickname , story_title , a.create_date , a.origin_name , a.change_name , reply_count from a_story a join c_member c on (email = writer_email) where a.status = 'Y' and a.couple_code = #{ coupleCode }
select reply_no , ref_sno , nickname , reply_content , reply_like , a.create_date from a_reply a join c_member c on(email = reply_writer) where a.status = 'Y' and ref_sno = #{ storyNo }
